participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and ambitious, Emily is passionate about her dream of becoming a lawyer. She is hardworking and has a strong connection to her rural upbringing.
participant_1.background: i'm from a small town. i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i was raised on a horse farm.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and optimistic, Jake is deeply passionate about music and enjoys sharing his talents with others. He is hardworking and has a strong desire to succeed in his musical career.
participant_2.background: i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i'm a musician and hope to make it big some day.
